name: Big Beast in the Maze
description:
Web version and standalone version run with the excellent Zeta x86 emulator by asie and a build of the Reconstruction of ZZT (matches ZZT 3.2) by the same!

Maze game with light puzzle and story elements.

While web emulation is awesome, you will probably still have a better time with desktop Zeta (my recommendation) or DoSBox. Details below.
